Class Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • Grid

  • public class Grid
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class creates and updates a 10x10 used by the gameInterface to create the battleship grids
    Author:
    Jamie Fergus

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Grid()
      Default Constructor for grid

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int countGridValues(char c)
      this method is used to count and return the number of grid boxes equal to the parameter c
      void displayGrid()
      This method displays the gird object in a readable format along with row numbers and column letters
      char getGridValue(int row, int col)
      this method is used to return the value of a specific grid box
      void setGridValue(int row, int col, char c)
      method used to set specific value of a specific grid box to the parameter c
      void updateGrid(int row, int col, boolean hit)
      this method updates a specific grid box with a hit or a miss value
      void updateShipGrid(int row, int col, int shipId)
      this method is used to position the specific grid boxes with part of a ship

    • Method Detail

      • displayGrid

        public void displayGrid()
        This method displays the gird object in a readable format along with row numbers and column letters

      • updateGrid

        public void updateGrid(int row,
                       int col,
                       boolean hit)
        this method updates a specific grid box with a hit or a miss value
        Parameters:
        row - - integer used to define what row of grid box is to be edited
        col - - integer used to define what column of grid box is to be edited
        hit - - boolean to indicate if the shot was a hit or a miss

      • updateShipGrid

        public void updateShipGrid(int row,
                           int col,
                           int shipId)
        this method is used to position the specific grid boxes with part of a ship
        Parameters:
        row - - integer used to define what row of grid box is to be edited
        col - - integer used to define what column of grid box is to be edited
        shipId - - integer used to identify which ship is being placed

      • getGridValue

        public char getGridValue(int row,
                         int col)
        this method is used to return the value of a specific grid box
        Parameters:
        row - - integer used to define what row of grid box is to be edited
        col - - integer used to define what column of grid box is to be edited
        Returns:
        grid[row][col] - returns the value of that specific grid box

      • countGridValues

        public int countGridValues(char c)
        this method is used to count and return the number of grid boxes equal to the parameter c
        Parameters:
        c - - character indicating what value of grid box is to be counted
        Returns:
        count - returns integer of the number grid boxes counted

      • setGridValue

        public void setGridValue(int row,
                         int col,
                         char c)
        method used to set specific value of a specific grid box to the parameter c
        Parameters:
        row - - integer used to define what row of grid box is to be edited
        col - - integer used to define what column of grid box is to be edited
        c - - character indicating what value of grid box is to be set to
